de-DE.title: Leveller
de-DE.banned: You are banned and can not level up.
de-DE.loginNeeded: You must be logged in to level to.
de-DE.authNeeded: be connected to your account must be either with Instagram (recommended), Facebook or Google+.
de-DE.warning: The Levellers leads after a certain time to highway. To bypass a Autobann, it is sufficient to log off and re-register. The account is then again at level 1.
